h3.a: Information for Going Forward This School Year

div.p:
In an effort to provide direction and to help all prepare for closure regarding the 2019-2020 school year, yesterday the Board of Education approved a revised calendar.Â This calendar reflects the intentions of Thayer Central regarding; Remote Learning, Certified Staff Contracts, 9 Month Classified Staff Contracts, and our Seniors end date.
Â
The calendar sets the following dates:
Â
May 8th as the final . . .

div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 08:55 am CDT

td.span: Scattered showers, with thunderstorms also possible after 2pm. Cloudy, with a high near 65. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then isolated rain between 8pm and 10pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 41. North wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
A slight chance of sprinkles after 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 69. North northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
